theBerserker:RecklessCleave.NAME: Reckless Cleave
theBerserker:RecklessCleave.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Deal !D! damage to a target then deal !D! damage to all enemies

theBerserker:GreaterCleave.NAME: Greater Cleave
theBerserker:GreaterCleave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies twice.

theBerserker:Rampage.NAME: RAMPAGE
theBerserker:Rampage.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. Draw a card. Deal !D! damage.

theBerserker:QuickFix.NAME: Quick Fix
theBerserker:QuickFix.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. Shuffle 2 Wounds into your drawpile.

theBerserker:AxeAQuestion.NAME: Axe A Question
theBerserker:AxeAQuestion.DESCRIPTION: Applies !M! Weak and Vulnerable to target.

theBerserker:Panic.NAME: Panic
theBerserker:Panic.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 5 Dazed into your drawpile. Gain !M! Regen.

theBerserker:Revenge.NAME: Revenge
theBerserker:Revenge.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to life lost this combat
theBerserker:Revenge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to double the amount of life lost this combat

theBerserker:WhirlwindOfDeath.NAME: Whirlwind Of Death
theBerserker:WhirlwindOfDeath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to double the amount of life lost this combat
